title: Caerphilly cheese and kale tart
ingredients: ['1 packet ready rolled shortcrust pastry', '55g butter', '2 red onions, finely chopped', '2 cloves garlic, minced', '2 eggs', '4 egg yolks', '250ml creme fraiche', '100ml double cream', '275g crumbled Caerphilly cheese', '200g kale leaves', 'salt and pepper, to taste', '2 tablespoons chopped fresh chervil', '1 tablespoon chopped spring onion']
